SummaryOfDirectCharitableActy.Description1: THE FOUNDATION IS A PRIVATE NONOPERATING FOUNDATION AND AS SUCH ITS ONLY ACTIVITY IS TO MAKE GRANTS OF CONTRIBUTIONS TO OTHER 501(C) ORGANIZATIONS, PRINCIPALLY TO PUBLIC CHARITIES.
